text: Songs of Experience is the 12th album by Irish rock band, U2. It was released on 2017. The photo on the album cover shows Bono's son Eli and The Edge's daughter Sian holding hands. The photo is by Anton Corbijn. ==Track listing== Notes * – additional production * – original production * – remix ==References== ==Other websites== *Songs of Experience on U2.com Category:2017 albums Category:U2 albums
title: Songs of Experience
